I got a message saying that the 
name is empty and I cannot enter a name to validate my new JRE.
Are you by chance missing the j9 launching plug-in?

No I have it. In fact the list of installed JREs is empty when I started. I had 
to manually change the file vmConfiguration.xml to get rid of the problem. Now 
it works fine.

Olivier, were you just opening the installed JRE preference page, or had you 
already clicked on the add button in the preference page?
I simply open the installed JRE page.

I have been unable to reproduce this problem, and from inspecting the code, 
cannot detect an NPE situation.
If you can reproduce the problem, please send us your workspace.
